## GetProductsOptions interface

Optional parameters for the [getProducts()](./firestore-stripe-payments.getproducts.md) function.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface GetProductsOptions 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [activeOnly?](./firestore-stripe-payments.getproductsoptions.activeonly.md) | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> Set to <code>true</code> to retrieve only the currently active set of Stripe products. If not set, returns all available products. When set, the effect is same as if called with the filter <code>[&quot;active&quot;, &quot;==&quot;, true]</code>. |
|  [includePrices?](./firestore-stripe-payments.getproductsoptions.includeprices.md) | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> Set to <code>true</code> to retrieve the prices along with a product. If not set, the product is returned with no prices (i.e. [Product.prices](./firestore-stripe-payments.product.prices.md) field will be empty). |
|  [limit?](./firestore-stripe-payments.getproductsoptions.limit.md) | number | <i>(Optional)</i> Maximum number of products to return. |
|  [where?](./firestore-stripe-payments.getproductsoptions.where.md) | [WhereFilter](./firestore-stripe-payments.wherefilter.md)<!-- -->\[\] | <i>(Optional)</i> An array of optoinal filters that will be applied when querying the products from the app database. |
